article_title: Jimmy Kimmel Confuses Pedestrians About Obamacare And The Shutdown Once Again
article_text:
Jimmy Kimmel had one simple question for pedestrians: "Did Republicans do the right thing by allowing Obamacare to move forward, even though the impending debt crisis could defund additional sequester furloughs and national parks and default ceiling fans?"



Obviously, this question means nothing. But that didn't stop people from answering the question with a mountain of BS.

article_summary:
Jimmy Kimmel had one simple question for pedestrians: "Did Republicans do the right thing by allowing Obamacare to move forward, even though the impending debt crisis could defund additional sequester furloughs and national parks and default ceiling fans?"
But that didn't stop people from answering the question with a mountain of BS.
Obviously, this question means nothing.
